00015 /* ------- RDSK ---------*/
00016 
00017 struct bRDSKblock {
00018 /*000*/ char    id[4];      /* RDSK */
00019 /*004*/ long    size;       /* 64 longs */
00020 /*008*/ ULONG   checksum;
00021 /*00c*/ long    hostID;     /* 7 */
00022 /*010*/     long    blockSize;  /* 512 bytes */
00023 /*014*/     long    flags;      /* 0x17 */
00024 /*018*/     long    badBlockList;
00025 /*01c*/     long    partitionList;
00026 /*020*/     long    fileSysHdrList;
00027 /*024*/     long    driveInit;
00028 /*028*/     long    r1[6];      /* -1 */
00029 /*040*/     long    cylinders;
00030 /*044*/     long    sectors;
00031 /*048*/     long    heads;
00032 /*04c*/     long    interleave;
00033 /*050*/     long    parkingZone;
00034 /*054*/ long    r2[3];      /* 0 */
00035 /*060*/ long    writePreComp;
00036 /*064*/ long    reducedWrite;
00037 /*068*/ long    stepRate;
00038 /*06c*/ long    r3[5];      /* 0 */
00039 /*080*/ long    rdbBlockLo;
00040 /*084*/     long    rdbBlockHi;
00041 /*088*/     long    loCylinder;
00042 /*08c*/     long    hiCylinder;
00043 /*090*/     long    cylBlocks;
00044 /*094*/     long    autoParkSeconds;
00045 /*098*/     long    highRDSKBlock;
00046 /*09c*/     long    r4;         /* 0 */
00047 /*0a0*/     char    diskVendor[8];
00048 /*0a8*/     char    diskProduct[16];
00049 /*0b8*/     char    diskRevision[4];
00050 /*0bc*/ char    controllerVendor[8];
00051 /*0c4*/     char    controllerProduct[16];
00052 /*0d4*/ char    controllerRevision[4];
00053 /*0d8*/     long    r5[10];     /* 0 */
00054 /*100*/
00055 };

00058 struct bBADBentry {
00059 /*000*/ long    badBlock;
00060 /*004*/ long    goodBlock;
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00064 struct bBADBblock {
00065 /*000*/ char    id[4];      /* BADB */
00066 /*004*/ long    size;       /* 128 longs */
00067 /*008*/ ULONG   checksum;   
00068 /*00c*/ long    hostID;     /* 7 */
00069 /*010*/     long    next;
00070 /*014*/     long    r1;
00071 /*018*/     struct bBADBentry blockPairs[61];
00072 };

00076 struct bPARTblock {
00077 /*000*/ char    id[4];      /* PART */
00078 /*004*/ long    size;       /* 64 longs */
00079 /*008*/ ULONG   checksum;
00080 /*00c*/ long    hostID;     /* 7 */
00081 /*010*/     long    next;
00082 /*014*/     long    flags;
00083 /*018*/     long    r1[2];
00084 /*020*/     long    devFlags;
00085 /*024*/     char    nameLen;
00086 /*025*/     char    name[31];
00087 /*044*/     long    r2[15];
00088 
00089 /*080*/     long    vectorSize;     /* often 16 longs */
00090 /*084*/     long    blockSize;  /* 128 longs */
00091 /*088*/     long    secOrg;
00092 /*08c*/     long    surfaces;
00093 /*090*/     long    sectorsPerBlock; /* == 1 */
00094 /*094*/     long    blocksPerTrack;
00095 /*098*/     long    dosReserved;
00096 /*09c*/     long    dosPreAlloc;
00097 /*0a0*/     long    interleave;
00098 /*0a4*/     long    lowCyl;
00099 /*0a8*/     long    highCyl;
00100 /*0ac*/ long    numBuffer;
00101 /*0b0*/     long    bufMemType;
00102 /*0b4*/     long    maxTransfer;
00103 /*0b8*/     long    mask;
00104 /*0bc*/     long    bootPri;
00105 /*0c0*/     char    dosType[4];
00106 /*0c4*/     long    r3[15];
00107 };

00109 
00110 struct bLSEGblock {
00111 /*000*/ char    id[4];      /* LSEG */
00112 /*004*/ long    size;       /* 128 longs */
00113 /*008*/ ULONG   checksum;
00114 /*00c*/ long    hostID;     /* 7 */
00115 /*010*/     long    next;
00116 /*014*/     char    loadData[123*4];
00117 };

00120 struct bFSHDblock {
00121 /*000*/ char    id[4];      /* FSHD */
00122 /*004*/ long    size;       /* 64 */
00123 /*008*/ ULONG   checksum;
00124 /*00c*/ long    hostID;     /* 7 */
00125 /*010*/     long    next;
00126 /*014*/     long    flags;
00127 /*018*/     long    r1[2];
00128 /*020*/     char    dosType[4];
00129 /*024*/     short   majVersion;
00130 /*026*/     short   minVersion;
00131 /*028*/     long    patchFlags;
00132 
00133 /*02c*/     long    type;
00134 /*030*/     long    task;
00135 /*034*/     long    lock;
00136 /*038*/     long    handler;
00137 /*03c*/     long    stackSize;
00138 /*040*/     long    priority;
00139 /*044*/     long    startup;
00140 /*048*/     long    segListBlock;
00141 /*04c*/     long    globalVec;
00142 /*050*/     long    r2[23];
00143 /*0ac*/     long    r3[21];
00144 };
